name: thesaurus-extension
description: A Thesaurus popup for Mozilla Firefox

scripts.start:win32: web-ext run --firefox="c:/Program Files/Firefox Developer Edition/firefox.exe" --start-url localhost:3000
scripts.start:chrome:win32: cd distribution && web-ext run -t chromium --start-url localhost:3000
scripts.start:chrome:linux: cd distribution && web-ext run -t chromium --chromium-binary '/usr/bin/microsoft-edge' --start-url localhost:3000
